snippet.title: ARC Raiders First Major Update Changes EVERYTHING | Stella Montis, New Enemies, and More!
snippet.description:
ARC Raiders North Line update is here, including the game's first community event, the introduction of new weapons and items, and eventually the opening of Stella Montis. In this podcast-style video Codiak & Livid discuss all the recent changes including a duos queue, updated store pricing, and gameplay changes

0:00 - Launch Numbers
0:58 - Arc Raiders 'Secret Sauce'
2:53 - PvE vs PvP Debate
9:07 - Foundational Updates
11:39 - Raider Decks
12:43 - First Community Event Breakdown
19:52 - Looking Ahead
